1kg_eas_hg19.description: 1000 Genomes Project East Asian (1KG EAS) VCF on the hg19 reference. Multi-allelic variants were decomposed. Variants were normalized. The INFO field includes the AF annotation, representing allele frequency in the EAS population.
1kg_eas_hg19.suggested_use: LD reference panel for creating region plot; infer strand for EAS population

1kg_hm3_hg19_eaf.description: 1KG HapMap3 hg19 EAF (GRCh37) provides allele frequency estimates for the HapMap3 populations on the hg19 reference genome, derived from 1000 Genomes Project data.
1kg_hm3_hg19_eaf.suggested_use: Ancestry inference and population structure analysis

1kgp_eur.description: 1000 Genomes Project EUR population VCF file with normalized allele frequencies, split variants, and 30x depth coverage, hg38 reference.
1kgp_eur.suggested_use: Used for imputation, fine-mapping, and variant quality control in European ancestry GWAS studies.

1kg_eas_hg38.description: 1000 Genomes Project East Asian (1KG EAS) VCF on the hg38 reference. Multi-allelic variants were decomposed. Variants were normalized. The INFO field includes the AF annotation, representing allele frequency in the EAS population.
1kg_eas_hg38.suggested_use: LD reference panel for creating region plot

19to38.description: LiftOver chain file for converting genomic coordinates from hg19 (GRCh37) to hg38 (GRCh38) reference builds, enabling cross-reference genome analysis.
19to38.suggested_use: Genome build conversion and coordinate remapping

ucsc_genome_hg19.description: UCSC Genome reference sequence on hg19 (GRCh37), providing the complete human genome assembly used for alignment and variant annotation.
ucsc_genome_hg19.suggested_use: Reference genome for alignment and annotation

1kg_eur_hg19.description: 1000 Genomes Project European (1KG EUR) VCF on the hg19 reference. Multi-allelic variants were decomposed. Variants were normalized. The INFO field includes the AF annotation, representing allele frequency in the EUR population.
1kg_eur_hg19.suggested_use: LD reference panel for creating region plot

dbsnp_hg19_b157.description: dbSNP hg19 dataset used for assigning rsID
dbsnp_hg19_b157.suggested_use: Assigning rsID to variants in GWAS summary statistics

plink2_binary_1kg_eas_hg19.description: 1000 Genomes Project East Asian (1KG EAS) VCF on the hg19 reference. Multi-allelic variants were decomposed. Variants were normalized. The INFO field includes the AF annotation, representing allele frequency in the EAS population.
plink2_binary_1kg_eas_hg19.suggested_use: LD reference panel for creating region plot; infer strand for EAS population

1kg_eas.description: 1000 Genomes Project East Asian (1KG EAS) VCF on the hg19 reference. Multi-allelic variants were decomposed. Variants were normalized. The INFO field includes the AF annotation, representing allele frequency in the EAS population.
1kg_eas.suggested_use: LD reference for clumping; infer strand for EAS population
